document.full_text: netflix's streaming app is now available for some android devices, but the fact that only some android phones get the latest features and others do not is a continuing problem for google.
document.title: netflix is available for some android devices, but not all
lines_and_colors: netflix's streaming app is now available for some android devices, but the fact that only some android phones get the latest features and others do not is a continuing problem for google.
